name: Goodwall - Community for Students & Professionals
description: Reach your full potential with Goodwalls diverse community of 1m+ students & young professionals from 150+ countries. Connect on shared interests, showcase yourself, and discover opportunities, including jobs and internships.  Were making headlines! As seen on: Forbes, Wall Street Journal, TEDx, TechCrunch, Entrepreneur, Cheddar, United Nations, World Economic Forum, and more. Your ultimate goal should not be a degree or job. It should be a better you.  Weve built an inclusive, supportive community where talent is inspired and empowered to maximize their potential and impact society positively. Join Goodwall for freeperfect for high school students, college undergraduates, university students, apprentices, entrepreneurs, and young professionals.  1. COMMUNITY: Build a meaningful network of lifelong professional connections based on common interests, goals, and ideals, such as social impact, technology, and entrepreneurship. Leverage your contacts to get inspired, ask and answer questions, chat with industry leaders, express yourself, pitch ideas, earn recognition, acknowledge your peers, and support others as they support you.  2. PROFILE: Craft a unique online profile to showcase your achievements, skills, and ideas. Go beyond listing basic grades or work experience and show off creative videos and compelling images to universities and employers. Its the traditional resume rebuilt for the next generation.  3. OPPORTUNITIES: Discover the perfect career opportunity or volunteer assignment for you based on your journey, aspirations, and interests. Weve got your back with 5m+ jobs and internships, $1m+ in scholarships and awards, and hundreds of courses.  Have a question, suggestion, or idea to share? Email us at hello@goodwall.io  **** 2019 Good Idea Award: Pitch your idea in 30s to participate and stand a chance to win $1,000! ****
